channel.title: I'm in need of a simple, working script for a flashgame
channel.description: It's to practice with SCAR for a bit. I just want the mouse to click on a white item. The item moves. Can someone point me to the right direction? Maybe even write a script?

item.title: I'm in need of a simple, working script for a flashgame
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

You should keep searching for that other one. This game wont teach you anything.

Assuming you know repeats and an if,then statement
Just repeat a

If(FindColor(x,y,255,0,0,600,400))then
  begin
    MoveMouse(x,y);
    ClickMouse(x,y,true);
    //Wait(100)                  //depends how fast the game goes.  I never actually played it past two seconds
  end;
end.

Read that over, then let me know if there is any part to it that you’re still troubled with.

Read full topic
item.source: I'm in need of a simple, working script for a flashgame
